item.title: Quickstart Flink SQL Unified Batch and Streaming
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: Set up a minimal CDC (Change Data Capture) and Unified Batch and Streaming processing using Docker, MySQL, and Flink SQL.
